pkgmetadata.longdescription: # IPython based debugging and exploring toolThis package provides the following features:- `IPS()` – An embedded IPython shell with some extra features like conditional execution: `IPS(x>0)`.- `activate_ips_on_exception()` – Open an IPython shell in the frame where an exception is raised, but with the ability to move to other frames.- `dirsearch` – easily search for substrings in the attribute list of an object or in the keys of a dict.- `displaytools` – an extesion for jupyter notebooks to display intermediate results (e.g. of assignments). Useful for didactic purposes.
